ModMetaData.name: Taki's Random Stuff (Continued) Lite
ModMetaData.author: Buck Taki, Deepfield
ModMetaData.description:
[img]https://i.imgur.com/WAEzk68.png[/img] A lite version of the Update of Buck Takis mod
- Removed all but oats and porridge
[img]https://i.imgur.com/7Gzt3Rg.png[/img]
[table] [tr] [td][url=https://invite.gg/Mlie][img]https://i.imgur.com/zdzzBrc.png[/img][/url][/td] [td][url=https://github.com/emipa606/TakisRandomStuff][img]https://i.imgur.com/kTkpTOE.png[/img][/url][/td] [/tr] [/table]
[img]https://i.imgur.com/NOW7jU1.png[/img] Adds Stuff to Rimworld. requirements - Jec's Tools -
Addition Oats - fast growing cereal Cereals - Type for oats and stuff to make porridge Porridge - A meal for growing colony
[img]https://i.imgur.com/Rs6T6cr.png[/img] [list] [*] See if the the error persists if you just have this mod and its requirements active. [*] If not, try adding your other mods until it happens again. [*] Post your error-log using [url=https://steamcommunity.com/workshop/filedetails/?id=818773962]HugsLib[/url] and command Ctrl+F12 [*] For best support, please use the Discord-channel for error-reporting. [*] Do not report errors by making a discussion-thread, I get no notification of that. [*] If you have the solution for a problem, please post it to the GitHub repository. [/list]
